lines.text: Take It Easy Slag Its Only Me Triple X

[as Triple X disguised as an Italian waiter]
Hows about-a dis-a bottle, senor?
Yeah, sure that bottle'll be fine.
Did you read the label senor?
"Follow me X X X" Never heard of that brand.
No, no, it says "Follow me Triple X."
Well, that's what always happens to guys who want to take over the world.
Yeah, they end up out of it.
